74#define AM_HAL_WDT_LFRC_CLK_128HZ (_VAL2FLD(WDT_CFG_CLKSEL, WDT_CFG_CLKSEL_128HZ))

146//*****************************************************************************
147#define am_hal_wdt_restart() \
148 do \
149 { \
150 WDT->RSTRT = WDT_RSTRT_RSTRT_KEYVALUE; \
151 (void)(WDT->RSTRT); \
152 } \
153 while(0)
